org.andengine.opengl.vbo
Class HighPerformanceVertexBufferObject

java.lang.Object
  org.andengine.opengl.vbo.VertexBufferObject
      org.andengine.opengl.vbo.HighPerformanceVertexBufferObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVertexBufferObject, IDisposable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HighPerformanceLineVertexBufferObject, HighPerformanceMeshVertexBufferObject, HighPerformanceRectangleVertexBufferObject, HighPerformanceSpriteBatchVertexBufferObject, HighPerformanceSpriteVertexBufferObject, HighPerformanceTextVertexBufferObject, HighPerformanceUniformColorSpriteVertexBufferObject
public class HighPerformanceVertexBufferObject
extends VertexBufferObject

Compared to a LowMemoryVertexBufferObject, the HighPerformanceVertexBufferObject uses 2x the heap memory, at the benefit of significantly faster data buffering (up to 5x faster!).

Since:
14:42:18 - 15.11.2011
Author:
Nicolas Gramlich
See Also:
LowMemoryVertexBufferObject} when to prefer a {@link LowMemoryVertexBufferObject} instead of a {@link HighPerformanceVertexBufferObject}

(c) Zynga 2011
